CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 25, 1958, page 1, reads: "No Eyeglasses - Mrs. Cora Stewart will celebrate her 100th birthday on Oct. 24. She demonstrated that her eyesight remains good and that she needs no glasses to thread a needle. She also sews all day without eyeglasses. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Cora Stewart seated in bedroom threading a needle, another version
